## IBoundedElement interface

A bounded element interface.

**Signature:**


## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getBoundingRectangle()](./blockly.iboundedelement_interface.getboundingrectangle_1_methodsignature.md) | Returns the coordinates of a bounded element describing the dimensions of the element. Coordinate system: workspace coordinates. |
